Author: stick-people
Text: I've actually started to take up the habit of running and walking every other day, including a small break where I smoke 1 cigarette. I chose to do so because after 7 years of being addicted to Binging and Purging, combatting that with another addiction might be the only way to get rid of it. After being 2 months clean of BP I'll stop smoking probably. I don't recommend nicotine at all, cigs smell like shit but they get the work done for now.

Author: Birdie49
Text: Can you do something else to distract yourself? Watch a favorite movie, go for a walk, listen to some music? Sometimes if all else fails, I just take a nice long nap and usually feel better when I wake up. Remember your grades don't define your worth ❤️
